data.name: ComponentAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The custom component {0} has already been registered.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component is registered for the second time.

data.name: ComponentMissingType
data.value: A custom component has no defined type.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component is specified without its type.

data.name: ComponentTypeNotFound
data.value: The custom component type {0} could not be found.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component has an invalid type specified.

data.name: ComponentTypeNotInitialized
data.value: The custom component type {0} could not be instantized.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component could not be instantized.

data.name: FontAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The font {0} has already been registered.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a font has already been registered.

data.name: FontCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: The font {0} could not be loaded.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a font could not be loaded.

data.name: FontDefinitionVersion
data.value: Font definition file version: {0}
data.comment: Represents the format in which font definition version is logged.

data.name: FontUndefined
data.value: The font {0} is not defined.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a font is not defined.

data.name: GameInfoVersion
data.value: Mod game info file version: {0}
data.comment: Represents the format in which game info version is logged.

data.name: GameScreenAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The game screen {0} has already been registered.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component is registered for the second time.

data.name: GameScreenMissingType
data.value: A game screen has no defined type.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component is specified without its type.

data.name: GameScreenTypeNotFound
data.value: The game screen type {0} could not be found.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component has an invalid type specified.

data.name: GameScreenTypeNotInitialized
data.value: The game screen type {0} could not be instantized.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a custom component could not be instantized.

data.name: InvalidVirtualPathException
data.value: Virtual path invalid: {0}
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when the specified virtual path is invalid.

data.name: ModFileIsInIncorrectFormatException
data.value: The specified mod file is in incorrect format: {0}
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when the specified mod file is in incorrect format.

data.name: ModFileIsInIncorrectFormatSpecificException
data.value: The specified mod file is in incorrect format: {0} Value '{1}' is invalid for the option '{2}'.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when detailed information is available about the incorrect format of the specified mod.

data.name: ModNotFoundException
data.value: The specified mod wasn't found: {0}
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when the specified mod wasn't found.

data.name: TextureAlreadyRegistered
data.value: The texture {0} has already been registered.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a texture has already been registered.

data.name: TextureCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: The texture {0} could not be loaded.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a texture could not be loaded.

data.name: TextureDefinitionVersion
data.value: Texture definition file version: {0}
data.comment: Represents the format in which texture definition version is logged.

data.name: TextureNotLoaded
data.value: The texture {0} was requested without loading.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a texture is used without being loaded first.

data.name: TextureUndefined
data.value: The texture {0} is not defined.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a texture is not defined.

data.name: TextureUserOverflow
data.value: The texture {0} was unloaded too many times.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a texture is unloaded more times than it was loaded.

data.name: TypeNotFound
data.value: The type {0} could not be found.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a type could not be found.

data.name: TypeNotInitialized
data.value: The type {0} could not be initialized.
data.comment: Represents the error message shown when a type could not be initialized.
